meanings.definition: To express deep sorrow or grief.
meanings.sent1: She was begroaning the loss of her beloved pet.
meanings.sent2: The widow begroaned at the funeral, unable to contain her sorrow.
meanings.sent3: The little girl begroaned dramatically when she dropped her ice cream cone.
meanings.sent4: The haunting melody of the violin begroaned through the empty halls.
meanings.sent5: His begroaning wails echoed through the night, a heartbreaking sound.

meanings.sent1: The customer began begroaning about the poor service at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She would always begroan about having to do her chores.
meanings.sent3: The toddler started begroaning when he was told he couldn't have any more candy.
meanings.sent4: The protesters continued to begroan about the unfair treatment they had received.
meanings.sent5: Her constant begroaning about the weather was starting to annoy her friends.

meanings.definition: To make a deep, mournful sound.
meanings.sent1: The wind begroaned through the trees on the stormy night.
meanings.sent2: The injured animal begroaned in pain as the vet examined it.
meanings.sent3: The old house seemed to begroan with every gust of wind.
meanings.sent4: The ancient ship begroaned as it struggled against the raging sea.
meanings.sent5: The ghostly figure begroaned softly, sending shivers down their spines.
